name: Google Logo Transformations
description:
I got bored so I made this just for fun..

Flip Google logo Upside-Down, Upside-Down (Mirror) or Right to Left. 

Should work even when Google changes the logo

Works great along with
http://userstyles.org/styles/101646/google-old-beautiful-logos
additional_info: Tested only with Firefox, and should work on every google domain as given here http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Google_domains

style_setting_options.label: Upside Down
Upside Down (Mirror)
Right to left
